---

title: "Artificial intelligence system can help prevent anemia in patients undergoing hemodialysis"
excerpt: "Anemia, a condition characterized by the lack of healthy red blood cells in the body, is common in patients with chronic kidney disease who need to undergo routine hemodialysis (a process that helps to 'clean' the blood when the kidneys don't function well)."
